item.title: 人工智能发出令人难以置信的市场反弹信号
item.description:
从美联储鹰派到中美停战的一周大事，在人工智能支出前景面前相形见绌。【原文：

A big week, from Fed hawks to the US-China truce, was dwarfed by AI spending prospects.

】

item.title: 韩国 Kospi 指数延续涨势，人工智能势头因与英伟达的关系而上升
item.description: 韩国股票基准在二十多年来最强劲的月度涨势基础上再接再厉，凸显了韩国市场在全球人工智能竞赛中不断提升的作用，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark is building on its strongest monthly rally in over two decades, underscoring the market’s rising role in the global AI race as highlighted by Nvidia Corp.’s local deals.】

item.title: 罗斯柴尔德认为明年将有更多全球企业在印度上市
item.description: 据罗斯柴尔德公司（Rothschild & Co.【原文：At least 10 multinational companies may list their Indian units in Mumbai over the next year as they seek higher valuations amid the country’s rapid growth, according to Rothschild & Co.】

item.title: DJ 报道，新加坡凯德置地和丰树酝酿合并
item.description: 据道琼斯周一报道，新加坡两家房地产资产管理公司正在酝酿合并，合并后将成为亚洲最大的房地产公司之一，管理资产超过 1,500 亿美元。【原文：Two Singapore property asset managers are mulling a merger that could create one of Asia’s largest real estate firms with more than $150 billion under management, Dow Jones reported on Monday.】

item.title: 期权市场的不确定性并未减缓印度高频交易公司的招聘步伐
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 前景改善，外国人买入印尼股票数量创年内之最
item.description: 全球资金正在重返印尼股市，这表明人们对东南亚最大经济体宏观前景的看法正在改善。【原文：Global funds are returning to Indonesian stocks in a sign of improving sentiment toward the macro outlook for Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 据说 Pony AI 计划以 139 港元的价格在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国自动驾驶公司小马智行（Pony AI Inc.【原文：Chinese autonomous driving firm Pony AI Inc. is telling prospective investors it plans to price its Hong Kong listing at HK$139, according to people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be identified because the information isn’t public.】

item.title: 最大支持者收紧救援贷款条件，万科债券大跌
item.description: 就在万科公布第三季度亏损加剧的同时，其国有股东要求开发商以抵押品为先前的贷款提供担保，并收紧了融资条件，导致中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co.’s bonds slumped after its state-owned shareholder pressed the developer to secure earlier loans with collateral — tightening financing terms just as Vanke reported a deeper third-quarter loss.】

item.title: 民间调查显示中国工厂活动增长放缓
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，10 月份中国制造业活动的扩张幅度低于预期，随着 2025 年的结束，经济发展势头更加令人担忧。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity expanded less than forecast in October, according to a private survey, adding to worrying signs about the economy’s momentum as 2025 winds down.】

item.title: 新西兰季度住宅批准数接近三年新高
item.description: 新西兰第三季度的建筑审批数量接近三年来的最高水平，这进一步表明建筑业的乐观迹象可能支撑经济复苏。【原文：New Zealand building approvals neared a three-year high in the third quarter, adding to signs of optimism in the construction industry that could underpin an economic recovery.】

item.title: 白宫称中国将重启对美部分金属出口
item.description: 根据白宫的一份声明，作为贸易休战的一部分，中国同意允许向美国出口包括镓在内的三种关键金属，并指出将取消对此类货物的禁令。【原文：China agreed to allow US-bound exports of three critical metals including gallium as part of its trade truce, according to a White House statement, pointing to the removal of bans on such shipments.】

item.title: NAB 从 MUFG 聘请 Sivarajah 负责亚洲银行业务
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank Ltd.）首席执行官安德鲁-欧文（Andrew Irvine）力图加强其在亚太地区的业务，因此聘请希瓦南-西瓦拉贾（Shivanan Sivarajah）领导澳大利亚以外的亚太地区业务。【原文：National Australia Bank Ltd. hired Shivanan Sivarajah to lead its business in Asia Pacific outside Australia as Chief Executive Officer Andrew Irvine pushes to boost its regional presence.】

item.title: 新世界将发行不超过 19 亿美元的新证券和票据
item.description: 根据一份交易所文件，陷入困境的香港建筑商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Distressed Hong Kong builder New World Development Co. has launched an exchange offer for its outstanding perpetual notes, issuing up to $1.9 billion worth of new securities, according to an exchange filing.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商 Seres 在香港上市融资 18 亿美元
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 Seres Group Co. 在香港上市的定价达到了其设定的上限，并行使了增加交易规模的选择权，从而筹集了 143 亿港元（18 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Seres Group Co. raised HK$14.3 billion ($1.8 billion) after pricing its Hong Kong listing at the upper limit it had set and exercising an option to increase its deal size.】

item.title: 贝宝支持的 Pine Labs 在孟买首次公开募股中寻求高达 4.39 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据一则广告称，数字支付服务提供商 Pine Labs Ltd. 计划通过在孟买首次公开发行股票筹集高达 390 亿卢比（约合 4.39 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Pine Labs Ltd., a digital payments providers, plans to raise as much as 39 billion rupees ($439 million) through an initial public offering in Mumbai, according to an advertisement.】

item.title: 票房哑弹正在成为流媒体热门话题
item.description: 电影制片厂正在重新思考如何在流媒体时代让电影发挥最大价值【原文：Movie studios are rethinking how to get the most value out of their films in the streaming age】

item.title: 特朗普称不会出席最高法院关税听证会
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将不出席最高法院本周就其全球关税制度合法性举行的听证会。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would skip attending the Supreme Court hearing this week over the legality of his worldwide tariffs regime.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油受制裁打击后在中国的承接者减少
item.description: 在美国和其他国家将莫斯科的顶级生产商及其部分客户列入黑名单之后，中国的炼油商正在回避俄罗斯的石油运输。【原文：Chinese oil refiners are shunning Russian shipments after the US and others blacklisted Moscow’s top producers and some of its customers.】

item.title: 中国终止税收优惠政策后，黄金跌回 4,000 美元下方
item.description: 在中国结束了对一些零售商的长期退税政策后，黄金跌破了每盎司4000美元，这一变化可能会损害最大的贵金属市场之一的需求。【原文：Gold dropped below $4,000 an ounce after China ended a long-standing tax rebate for some retailers, a change that could hurt demand in one of the largest precious-metals markets.】

item.title: 阿根廷总统米莱伊任命内政部长以推动改革
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）表示，他将任命迭戈-桑蒂利（Diego Santilli）为内政部长，让这位资深特工为他的改革议程争取政治支持。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei said he’s naming Diego Santilli as interior minister, tapping a veteran operative to help rally political support for his reform agenda.】

item.title: 新西兰卢克松称基于规则的全球贸易秩序受到挑战
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克森（Christopher Luxon）说，自大流行病以来，全球贸易环境发生了巨大变化，几十年来为各国提供良好服务的基于规则的体系正日益受到威胁。【原文：New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said the global trading environment has changed substantially since the pandemic and the rules-based system that served nations well over many decades is increasingly under threat.】

item.title: 欧佩克+表示明年将停止增产后石油上涨
item.description: 在欧佩克+表示计划在 2026 年第一季度暂停增产之后，石油价格连续第四天上涨。【原文：Oil advanced a fourth day after OPEC+ said it planned to pause output increases in the first quarter of 2026, following another modest hike for next month.】

item.title: 借贷成本居高不下，港元债券销售下滑
item.description: 由于高企的本地利率削弱了借贷欲望，以港元计价的债券发行在创纪录的一个月后失去了势头。【原文：Hong Kong dollar-denominated bond issuance has lost momentum following a record month, as high local interest rates eroded borrowing appetite.】

item.title: 股市开盘涨跌不一，欧佩克+将暂停加息：市场综述
item.description: 在全球股市连续第七个月上涨之后，亚洲股市周一开盘谨慎，投资者在等待新的催化剂。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a cautious open Monday as investors awaited fresh catalysts after global equities extended their winning streak to a seventh consecutive month.】

item.title: 台湾面临微妙的货币平衡以避免被贴上操纵国的标签
item.description: 台币的反弹是对岛内中央银行的拳击，使其干预空间有限，以避免被美国贴上 "汇率操纵国 "的标签。【原文：The Taiwanese dollar’s rally is boxing in the island’s central bank, leaving it with limited room to intervene in order to avoid a “currency manipulator” label from the US.】

item.title: 国债反弹证明特朗普 "出卖美国 "的批评是错误的
item.description:
尽管忧虑之声不绝于耳，从迫在眉睫的赤字到对美联储的攻击，美国国债依然是世界上最值得信赖的资产。【原文：

Despite the drumbeat of worries — from looming deficits to attacks on the Fed — US government debt secures its reign as the world’s most trusted asset.

】

item.title: 菲律宾寻求修复全球表现最差的股市
item.description: 这是教科书上的投资策略—；持续储蓄，让时间和复利发挥作用。这就是卡尔-爱迪生-巴拉格塔斯（Carl Edison Balagtas）在2016年所做的事情，他开始将每月工资的一半存入菲律宾股市，希望以此来保障自己的未来。【原文：It’s the textbook investment strategy — save consistently and let time and compound interest do its work. That’s what Carl Edison Balagtas did in 2016 when he started socking half of his monthly salary into the Philippines stock market in hopes of securing his future.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将与 Cboe 合作，此前当地部门被出售
item.description: 澳大利亚证券监管机构表示，将与 Cboe Global Markets Inc.【原文：Australia’s securities regulator said it will work closely with Cboe Global Markets Inc., after the exchange operator said it plans to sell its local markets units.】

item.title: Pimco 押注澳大利亚央行更大幅度降息后澳大利亚债券反弹
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. is positioning for a rebound in Australian government bonds, betting the central bank will resume policy easing next year even as traders push back expectations for rate cuts.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行因住房和商业贷款盈利达到预期
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp.【原文：Westpac Banking Corp.’s profit came in line with estimates as growth in mortgages and loans to businesses buoyed the Australian lender.】
